short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accesing zoom links or any links with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store and organize your class zoom links easily with EasyLink.

No need to clutter your bookmark bar with all the school links. EasyLink makes it easy to organize all your class links, study resources and frequent google searches under one tiny extension.
